dialogues.question: introduction
segments: I was here yesterday at the time of the crime
abbr:
His name is Joe
Joe is 25
Joe witnessed the crime

dialogues.question: What were you doing the night of the crime?
segments: I was here the night of the crime
I was busy cleaning the bar counter
abbr:
Joe was at the bar during the crime
Joe was cleaning the counter

dialogues.question: How did you know the crime happened?
segments: I heard a loud crash, it sounded tremendously loud
abbr: Joe claims to have heard a loud crash
